title: Strengthening Business Practical Skills: Workshop on Ontology-Based Personalized e-Learning System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design an ontology-based personalized learning model to recommend language education content matching learner profiles with 80% accuracy.
Learners can implement an ontology framework reflecting learner backgrounds, preferences, and performance using a PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.
Learners can develop a semi-automated personalized e-learning prototype executable in a smartphone-based environment as a team project.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
